name: 地球化學
restrict: ◎限大三大四 ◎限碩一碩二碩三以上修習
goals: An introduction to the chemical processes that influence the solid Earth system.
syllabus:
Week 1    Introduction to geochemistry/Origin of elements

Week 2    Chemical Differentiation of the Earth

Week 3    Properties of Elements (i.e. chemical bonding, ionic radii)

Week 4    Element Transport

Week 5    Geochronology

Week 6    Radiogenic Isotopes

Week 7    Stable Isotopes

Week 8    Mid-term exam

Week 9    Geochemical Cycles

Week 10  Environments

Week 11  Geochemistry in Sedimentary Petrology

Week 12  Geochemistry in Metamorphic Petrology

Week 13  Geochemistry in Igneous Petrology

Week 14  Class presentations

Week 15  Class presentations

Week 16 Final Exam
prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for junior, senior ◎Exclusive for first year of graduate school, second year of graduate school, third year and above of graduate school
